0.1.0-alpha.name: titon/utility
0.1.0-alpha.description: The utility package provides convenience classes for basic tasks like validation, formatting, sanitization and more.

suggest.ext-fileinfo: Validate file mime types with the Utility\Validate class
suggest.titon\/common: Convert from maps, arrays, and vectors using the Common package
suggest.titon\/io: Load configuration files using an Io\Reader class
